feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 04:25 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: E 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
